name: Rhythm Square
description:
This is Rhythm Game. Please check your volume.

[You need a number pad] 

Select music with ↑ and ↓ key, and press the space bar to start!

789

456

123 

and "R" is restarted, and "H" is back on the menu. (home) 

If you want your own notes, modded and follow my memos! (Memo starts in MusicManager sprite.)
